subsection.name: Setting up Eclipse
subsection.p: Building TestPanel should be possible under any environment, but using Eclipse is recommended. First set up your environment:

ul.li: Install Maven (3.0 or newer) and ensure it works from the command line.
Install the Windowbuilder plugin into Eclipse.

subsection.name: Check out the Project
subsection.p: Next, check out the HAPI root project.
